public class CheckersPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.io.Serializable

Basically sets up board and moves for each piece.

public void blackillegalmove()
Looks for all illegal black moves in file. Then, if none are found moves to all legal moves.

Looks for all illegal white moves in file. Then, if none are found moves to all legal moves.
